column4: I downloaded ubuntu  8.10 i386 instead of i686 but it seems to be doing great and graphics are good also for a GeForce Ti 4200 nvidiacard
is the live cd running off the 8.04 graphics?
there is only one 23 bit release
there is a 32 bit (i386) and a 64 bit (amd-64) version.  either should work
